name: The Trolley Problem (daid)
description:
Entry for the 2 button game jam. Not 100% happy with the result. Gameplay is quite absent. 

The train can be controlled with the left&right keys to tilt it. Make sure you do not derail from the track. And decide which side you will pick for each of the presented problems.

What went well?

  • I like how the train tilting feels, too much time was spend on this
  • The effect where far away objects disappear under the horizon
  • The text above the tracks, first time using text in a 3D environment

What didn't went well?

  • After spending a lot of time on getting the train to stay properly on the track and follow it properly, I failed to make fun gameplay.
  • Spend a lot of time trying to figure out why my 3D rendering looked wrong, to find out it was an issue with the models.
